#!/usr/bin/env ruby18 -wKU require 'jcode'
FIGURES = "0123456789" FIGURE_SPACE = [0x2007].pack("U") THIN_SPACE = [0x2009].pack("U")
def pretty(number) number.to_s.gsub(/\d{1,3}(?=\d{3}+(?!\d))/, '\0' + THIN_SPACE) end
counts = `wc -lwm`.scan(/\d+/) counts[0] = counts[0].to_i + 1 # increase one to the line count
fig_cnt = counts.map { |num| pretty(num).jcount(FIGURES) }.max spc_cnt = counts.map { |num| pretty(num).jcount(THIN_SPACE) }.max
%w[ line word character ].each do |unit| cnt = pretty(counts.shift) prefix = FIGURE_SPACE * (fig_cnt - cnt.jcount(FIGURES)) + THIN_SPACE * (spc_cnt - cnt.jcount(THIN_SPACE)) plural = cnt.tr('^0123456789', '').to_i != 1 ? 's' : '' printf(" %s%s %s%s\n", prefix, cnt, unit, plural) end
